item.title: Then Jesus Beholding Him Loved Him
item.description:
Then Jesus Beholding Him Loved Him by Elder S. Mark Palmer, Of the Seventy given in Session 6 of 187th Annual General Conference on Fri Mar 31 2017
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder S. Mark Palmer, Of the Seventy

item.description:

item.title: “Return unto Me … That I May Heal You”
item.description:
